# Rizk SDK Documentation | Documentation

> Documentation for the Rizk SDK - a powerful toolkit for building AI applications with built-in guardrails, telemetry, and policy enforcement.

## Main

- [GitHub](https://github.com/rizk-tools/rizk-sdk)
- [Installation](https://docs.rizk.tools/getting-started/installation/)
- [Quickstart](https://docs.rizk.tools/getting-started/quickstart/)
- [Configuration](https://docs.rizk.tools/getting-started/configuration/)
- [Guardrails](https://docs.rizk.tools/core-concepts/guardrails/)
- [Policy Enforcement](https://docs.rizk.tools/core-concepts/policy-enforcement/)
- [Telemetry](https://docs.rizk.tools/core-concepts/telemetry/)
- [Tracing](https://docs.rizk.tools/core-concepts/tracing/)
- [Rizk Class](https://docs.rizk.tools/api/rizk/)
- [Client](https://docs.rizk.tools/api/client/)
- [Fast Rules Engine](https://docs.rizk.tools/api/fast-rules-engine/)
- [Guardrails Engine](https://docs.rizk.tools/api/guardrails-engine/)
- [LLM Fallback](https://docs.rizk.tools/api/llm-fallback/)
- [Policy Augmentation](https://docs.rizk.tools/api/policy-augmentation/)
- [State Manager](https://docs.rizk.tools/api/state-manager/)

- [Documentation](https://docs.rizk.tools/)
